# GitHub Actions Secrets and Variables
# Format: NAME=VALUE

# This file is a placeholder for GitHub Actions secrets and variables.
# In a real implementation, this file would be generated by a script with proper authentication
# to the GitHub API to fetch the actual secrets and variables.

# Examples of how secrets and variables would be listed:
GITHUB_TOKEN=********
API_KEY=********
DATABASE_URL=********
ENVIRONMENT=production
DEBUG_MODE=false
